    • getNumOfFriends

      public int getNumOfFriends​(int userId)
      Retrieve the number of friends to display > If more than 3 friends, return 3. > If less than 3 friends, return the original number.
      Parameters:
      userId - userId of the user
      Returns:
      ArrayList of UserProfile objects
